name: The Prowess
startIntroPart2: Will you accept the challenge? Will you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: It is a shame that we must resort to violence, it is not the custom of kings to kill kings.
attacked: I warn you against making a habit of shedding blood. Blood never sleeps.
defeated: This is not victory. 'Victory' is changing the hearts of your opponents; through gentleness, through kindness.
introduction: By the grace of the God, the powerful, the victorious, the everlasting of whose Kingdom there is no end, I greet you, my sincere friend.
uniqueText:
Earn 33% of the damage done to non-air units as Gold
Earn 100% of killed Barbarian unit's Cost as Gold
Starting from the Medieval era, Can convert gold to Production and Faith when Religion is enabled
Starting from the Industrial era, Can convert gold to Science or Culture
uniques: Earn [33]% of the damage done to [non-air] units as [Gold]
